name: my-vue-directives
description: 解决WebStorm 无法识别Vue自定义指令

attributes.name: v-permission
attributes.description: 权限控制指令，例如 v-permission="'system:user:add'" 或 v-permission="['system:user:add','system:user:update']"

attributes.name: v-role
attributes.description: 角色控制指令，例如 v-role="'admin'" 或 v-role="['admin','editor']"
